name: Mutants
summary:
🧪 MUTANTS: ESCAPE THE MADNESS 🧪

Step into the terrifying world of Mutants, where you are an experimental animal trapped in a horror research facility. Explore every corner of the facility, but beware—each step could lead you into one of the many horror experiences hidden behind mysterious portals.

🎭 EXPERIENCE TRUE HORROR 🎭

Mutants is more than just a game. It’s the ultimate horror experience. With high-quality graphics, immersive sound design, and a deeply unsettling atmosphere, this is horror...
